data.message: I have had a heavy heart for you since you have become president. .people are so disrespectful. I keep you and your family in my prayers.democrat.republican. Independent you were placed by god to become a powerful leader.iam gald your term is coming to an end only because of all the ungratefulness in your country..you are a child of a mighty god..he love you no matter what others think or say..god bless you .i feel you have done a great job and i feel your sincere concerns.god first
